content: elevate your crochet skills with the autunno shawl pattern designed for intermediate crocheters looking to expand their repertoire this stunning shawl features a captivating combination of stripes lace and textured stitches creating a dynamic and eye-catching accessory worked flat from the top down the pattern incorporates front post stitches for added depth and dimension with a video tutorial and written instructions available crocheters of all skill levels can confidently tackle this project and create a beautiful triangle shawl to showcase their craftsmanship **unique features-** intermediate level pattern stripes lace and textured stitches front post stitch technique top-down construction written pattern and video tutorial available **materials needed-** yarn berroco modern cotton dk 1760 yards hook us size 5 0 3 75mm gauge 5 stitches by 2 row = 1 inches in double_crochet
